title: Is the manager of Desparge a member of the U.S. Service?
subtitle: Pizza Hut confirmed that a man named Caleb Lee made up a story about a rude shop manager denying soldiers and first responders.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A man named Caleb Lee asked for a military discount, and he was honored by the manager of Pizza Hot's restaurant for his alleged sense of entitlement.
